dict.string: Copyright Â© 2010 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch provides an integer identifier, starting at zero, unique among all instances of this patch.
When each frame is rendered, Order is reset to zero, and, as each Order patch is evaluated, a unique value is assigned to each Order patch.
Each iteration within an Iterator gets a unique value, too.
http://kineme.net/
A string key representing the counter to be used. Each channel has an independent counter starting at zero each frame.
A unique identifier representing the order in which this patch was evaluated.
